import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import styles from './Account.module.scss' import AvatarMeng from '../../assets/images/AvatarMeng.svg' import { userAction } from '../../redux/actions' const Account = () => { const token = useState(useSelector((value) => value?.userReducer.token)) const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleSignOutClick = () => { dispatch(userAction.LOGIN({ token: 'null', })) console.log('===============================================') console.log('token', token) console.log('===============================================') } return (
